description: T A N properties is pleased to offer a Furnished 1 Bedroom Apartment in Cappadocia in JVC for rent. Cappadocia is a five-storey residential building in JVC District 13, Jumeirah Village Circle, Dubai. The project was completed by December 2013. The development contains a total of 67 units. Cappadocia comprises a mix of studios, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments as well as penthouses, duplexes and loft apartments. The apartments offer different styles and features including high tech climate control systems, contemporary home accessories, open kitchens with breakfast counters, spacious bathrooms, terraces, private gardens, private swimming pools and Jacuzzis in penthouses, built in closets and walk-in wardrobes for larger apartments. Facilities include a temperature controlled swimming pool, fitness hall, solar controlled daylight penetration, controlled access for increased security, high speed internet connection and cable TV, enclosed private car parking for each unit, large public amenity site, and green parks.  The Property Highlights are: · 1 Bedroom· 2 Bathrooms· 1 Parking· Balcony· Built in Wardrobes· Central A/C· Fully Fitted Kitchen· Shared S/Pool . Gym 🏋️‍♀️ · On Middle Floor· Pets Allowed· 830 Sq. description: For Rent - Fully landscaped 4 Bedroom Large Type B villa, single row, large plot is READY NOW.  Move in today to the brand new, gated development of Murooj. This villa is bright, light and spacious with a downstairs ensuite bedroom, large kitchen that can be opened up or closed with separate 2 door entrance.  The long large open plan Livingroom is perfect for entertaining. Additionally there is a guest bathroom, laundry and maids room. The large glass staircase leads to a big open plan family area with pantry.  The master bedroom has walk in wardrobes and a large private bathroom with double sink, bath and separate shower.  The additional 2 bedrooms also have build in wardrobes and private bathrooms. All bedrooms have beautiful light wooden flooring throughout.  There are 2 covered balconies offering fantastic views across the community and city.  At the front of the villa there is covered parking for 3 cars, a secure high walled landscaped garden gives maximum privacy to this single row villa.  A perfect family homeThis newly handed over community has multiple pools, parks and play areas, including dog parks and running tracks. Call for more information today. ------- Development Details -------Al Furjan is a residential property development near Jebel Ali in the United Arab Emirates. Nakheel is the master developer of this project. The Al Furjan development will comprise four specific villages: North, South, East and West, that will share the same streetscape designs, a network of pathways and access to amenities. Each village will have its own distinct characteristics that compliment the other and create a balanced variety of experiences.

description: Apartment features :• Built up Area : 304 sqft• Apartment : Studio • Built in wardrobes • 01 Bathroom• Open kitchen with Built in Appliances • Spacious living Area • Bright Apartment • Open View Balcony Key Features of Azizi Riviera Meydan : • Chiller Free ( No AC usage Bill)• Swimming Pool• BBQ Seating Area• Bocce Area• Zen Garden• Yoga Zone• Pets Agility Area• Lounge with Movie Night• Outdoor Chess Play AreaRIVIERA, MBR CITYRiviera is one of Azizi’s flagship developments located in Meydan at the heart of Mohammed Bin Rashid City (MBR City) in Dubai. In a prime location, close to Meydan Racecourse, the home of The Dubai World Cup and a variety of sports and leisure facilities, Riviera offers a desirable address and is within close proximity to Downtown Dubai and Dubai International Airport. Inspired by the French Riviera, the iconic mixed-use community will be home to residential apartments, retail outlets and a variety of onsite amenities. Riviera comprises of various mid-rise residential buildings with a variety of retail outlets at ground floor level.  Each individual building will benefit from a swimming pool, landscaped gardens and a gym.  Key attractions will include a beautiful crystal lagoon and beach spanning 2km, a beautiful palm tree lined boulevard and numerous community parks.  Residential properties include studios, one, two and three bedroom apartments offering a variety of different views ranging from orientation towards Downtown Dubai and Burj Khalifa to community pool and canal views.  Riviera will also feature a wide variety of cafes and restaurants, convenience stores and shops.  When fully completed, Riviera will be home to over 20,000 residents including professionals and families. Phase I, II and III are currently under construction. Proximity to Attractions: Close to popular attractions such as The Dubai Mall, Dubai Fountain, and various dining and entertainment options. Vibrant Neighborhood: Surrounded by a lively community, offering a range of cafes, restaurants, and shops within walking distance. Family-Friendly Environment: Safe and secure neighborhood ideal for families, with parks and recreational facilities nearby. Attractive Returns: Given its prime location and luxurious features, the apartment offers excellent rental yields for investors. Appreciation Potential: Properties in this area have shown consistent appreciation, making it a smart long-term investment. Lifestyle BenefitsLuxurious Living: Enjoy a high-end lifestyle with access to premium amenities and services. Community Vibe: Engage with a diverse community of residents, fostering a sense of belonging. Cultural Experience: Experience Dubai's rich culture and lifestyle, with numerous events, festivals, and activities throughout the year. ConclusionThis stunning apartment, with its incredible views and luxurious features, presents an exceptional opportunity for both renters and investors. Ideal for those seeking a high-quality living experience in one of the world’s most vibrant cities, this property combines comfort, style, and convenience. description: Pratima Katiyar with Coldwell Banker is pleased to present you this 3 BR Townhouse in Murano Townhouses, Al Furjan. Discover your new home in the vibrant community of Al Furjan at Murano Townhouses, where contemporary design meets family-friendly living. This spacious 3-bedroom townhouse offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a serene yet connected lifestyle in Dubai. As you enter this beautifully designed townhouse, you are welcomed by an open and airy living space. The ground floor features a spacious living and dining area, perfectly complemented by large windows that flood the space with natural light. The modern layout is ideal for both entertaining guests and enjoying relaxed family evenings. The closed kitchen is a chef’s delight, sleek countertops and ample cabinet space. Whether you're preparing a quick breakfast or a gourmet dinner, this kitchen is designed to meet all your culinary needs. Upstairs, you’ll find three generously sized bedrooms, each offering a tranquil retreat. The master bedroom features a luxurious en-suite bathroom and a private balcony, perfect for enjoying your morning coffee or unwinding after a long day. The additional bedrooms are equally spacious and share a modern, well-appointed bathroom. One of the standout features of this townhouse is the private garden, providing an outdoor oasis where you can relax, entertain, or let the children play. The garden is designed to offer a sense of privacy while still being part of the vibrant community of Al Furjan. Located in Al Furjan, this townhouse is well-connected to major road networks like Sheikh Zayed Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, ensuring easy access to key areas of Dubai such as Dubai Marina, JBR, and Downtown Dubai. The nearby Al Furjan Pavilion and Ibn Battuta Mall provide a variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and experience the best of Al Furjan living.

Elegant Bedrooms: Each of the three meticulously designed bedrooms is a private sanctuary, featuring plush furnishings, premium bedding, and en-suite bathrooms with luxurious fixtures. Gourmet Kitchen: The fully equipped kitchen is a chef’s dream, featuring high-end appliances, sleek countertops, and ample storage space. Whether preparing a quick meal or a gourmet feast, this kitchen provides everything you need. Exclusive Amenities: Enjoy access to the hotel’s world-class amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, a rejuvenating spa, and a rooftop pool with panoramic views of the city. Personalized concierge services are available to cater to your every need. Explore nearby attractions such as The Dubai Mall, the Dubai Opera, and the vibrant Downtown Dubai area. Immerse yourself in the ultimate luxury experience with a stay in our 3-bedroom suite at Fountain Views Hotel, where every detail is crafted to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.

This Villa features:: 3 Bedrooms master: 3 washroom: Maid room: Shared swimming pool: Private Backyard: Spacious Living and Dining Hall: Tv areaMirdif is a residential area located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Like many areas of Dubai, Mirdif has a cosmopolitan population of approximately 37,000 representing a wide range of nationalities and consisting mainly of villa developments, or single privately held villas. Mirdif borders Al Mizhar from the north and Al Warqaa from the south and is adjacent to the Rashidiya Metro station and Dubai International Airport. To the eastern part of Mirdif is the popular Al Mushrif Park.

Direct access to Hessa Street and Emirates RoadClose to the Al Maktoum International Airport and the Expo 2020 siteRemraam is a peaceful gated community in Dubailand set on the intersection of Emirates Road (E611) and Hessa Street (D61). The housing development by Dubai Properties, which is a subsidiary of Dubai Holdings, offers elegant apartments across two clusters. Announced in 2007, its first phase Al Thamam was handed over in 2013 while the second phase Al Ramth is under construction but has delivered a few apartment buildings. It is a pleasant family-friendly community that offers spacious homes and unmatched facilities. The residents can be benefited from amenities such as retail outlets, shopping malls, leisure places, a gymnasium and a swimming pool. The residential community is located on the opposite side of Mudon Community and Golf City and is well-connected to notable landmarks such as Trump International Golf Club and Dubai Autodrome.

Ft. -Microwave-Iron-Iron board-Kettle-Coffee machine-Safe box-All kitchen appliancesAmenities:-Rooftop Infinity Pool-Fitness Gym-Gymnasium-High-Speed Elevators-24 Hour Security-Kids play area-Park amenitiesSeven Palm is perfectly positioned on the trunk of Palm Jumeirah, directly across from Nakheel Mall and next to DUKES The Palm hotel, providing residents with a wide range of dining and entertainment options. This premier development showcases stunning views of the Arabian Gulf, the Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab, and the Dubai Eye. The Seven Palm complex is divided into two towers: the South Tower, which houses a luxury hotel, and the North Tower, offering exclusive residential units. A standout feature of the development is the breathtaking infinity pool that connects the two towers at the top, complemented by an array of food and beverage outlets designed to cater to both residents and visitors. With its strategic location, Seven Palm offers exceptional connectiavity. It's approximately a 17-minute drive to Dubai Mall, 8 minutes to Palm Jumeirah, 13 minutes to Burj Al Arab, and 13 minutes to The Walk at JBR. Dubai International Airport (DXB) is about 26 minutes away, while Al Maktoum International Airport is roughly a 35-minute drive. This prime setting combines luxury living with excellent accessibility, making Seven Palm a top choice for those seeking proximity to Dubai’s major attractions and destinations.

description: Discover your new home at Aurion Residence in the vibrant Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC)! This stylish 1-bedroom apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. Nestled in one of Dubai’s most sought-after communities, this apartment is designed for those who appreciate modern living with easy access to the best of the city. Key FeaturesSpacious Layout: 1 bedroom, 2 bathrooms, with a well-designed open floor plan for maximum space and comfort. Contemporary Kitchen: Sleek cabinets, high-quality countertops, and modern appliances – perfect for your culinary adventures. Bright Living Area: Large floor-to-ceiling windows filling the space with natural light and offering stunning views of the community. Master Bedroom with En-Suite: Generous bedroom with built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom for ultimate privacy. Private Balcony: Step out onto your balcony and enjoy the beautiful views of JVC's lush green surroundings. High-Quality Finishes: Elegant interiors with premium fixtures and fittings throughout. Building AmenitiesFully Equipped Gym: Maintain your fitness routine with access to a state-of-the-art gym. Rooftop Swimming Pool: Relax and unwind with a swim in the rooftop pool, offering stunning skyline views. 24/7 Security: Round-the-clock security and CCTV surveillance for a safe living environment. Covered Parking: Secure parking space included for your convenience. Dedicated Children’s Play Area: A safe and fun zone for kids within the residence. Pet-Friendly: A welcoming environment for your four-legged family members. Community HighlightsLocated in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), known for its peaceful, family-friendly vibe. Easy access to major roads like Al Khail Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, ensuring a quick commute to Dubai Marina, Downtown Dubai, and Al Barsha. Close proximity to top-rated schools, healthcare facilities, supermarkets, and shopping malls. Plenty of green spaces, parks, and walking trails, making it an ideal choice for outdoor enthusiasts. Why Choose Aurion Residence?Aurion Residence offers a lifestyle of luxury, comfort, and convenience in one of Dubai’s most dynamic communities. Whether you’re relaxing by the pool, working out in the gym, or enjoying the vibrant neighborhood, this is the perfect place to call home. Don’t miss out on this fantastic rental opportunity! Schedule a viewing today!﻿At Silver Dunes, we believe in providing our clients with the latest and most accurate information on the Dubai real estate market. It is our commitment to serve as a one-stop solution for all the real estate needs of our clients enabling them to make the right decisions.

description: FÄM PROPERTIES is proud to offer you this Brand New, Fully Furnished 1 Bedroom Apartment in Beach Isle. EMAAR BEACHFRONT :Located in the new vibrant Dubai Harbour, EMAAR Beachfront is a new exclusive island comprising 27 luxury towers. Unlike anywhere else in Dubai, residents have 750 meters of pristine white-sand private beach access on both sides of their home. LOCATION :EMAAR Beachfront is an island destination with an accessible, well-connected location. Palm Jumeirah, Dubai Marina and JBR are all accessible within minutes, while the main areas of the city like Downtown Dubai and Dubai International Airport will be only a joyride away. description: A one-bedroom apartment in Dubai often features a modern and luxurious design with a focus on comfort and convenience. Here’s a general description:**Living Space:** The apartment typically has an open-plan living and dining area that leads to a balcony, providing stunning views of the city skyline or nearby landscapes. Large windows allow for natural light to flood the space. **Kitchen:** The kitchen is usually equipped with high-end appliances, including a refrigerator, oven, and dishwasher. It features sleek cabinetry and often includes a breakfast bar or island. **Bedroom:** The bedroom is spacious, often featuring built-in wardrobes and en-suite bathroom facilities. It may have large windows or a balcony, enhancing the overall sense of space and light. **Bathroom:** The bathroom is designed with contemporary finishes, often including a walk-in shower or a bathtub, along with modern fixtures and fittings. **Amenities:** Many Dubai one-bedroom apartments come with access to amenities such as swimming pools, fitness centers, and communal gardens. Some may also offer concierge services and security. **Location:** Depending on the specific area, the apartment may be close to shopping malls, restaurants, and public transportation, making it ideal for both residents and investors. If you need more specific details or a different angle, just let me know!

description: A **three-bedroom apartment with views of the Burj Khalifa** that is **fully furnished** typically refers to a luxurious, high-end living space in a prime location, often found in Dubai’s downtown area. Here's a detailed breakdown of what you can generally expect:### 1. **Location and Views**  - **Proximity to Burj Khalifa:** The apartment is likely to be situated in a tower or residential complex close to, or with direct views of, the **Burj Khalifa**. This iconic skyscraper is a focal point of Dubai's skyline, and such apartments offer unparalleled views of the building itself as well as the surrounding areas, including the **Dubai Fountain**, **Dubai Mall**, and other parts of the city. The view of Burj Khalifa, especially at night when it's illuminated, is a significant selling point for these properties.   - **Urban Living:** Expect the apartment to be centrally located within **Downtown Dubai**, an area known for its luxury living, upscale amenities, and proximity to shopping, dining, and entertainment venues. ### 2. **Interior Design and Furnishings**  - **Modern, High-End Furnishings:** The apartment is fully furnished, meaning it comes with **high-quality furniture and decor** throughout. Think plush sofas, designer coffee tables, stylish beds, luxurious rugs, and modern lighting. The furniture will likely be from premium brands, offering both comfort and style.   - **Open Floor Plan:** Spacious living areas are common in these apartments, with an **open-concept layout** that connects the living room, dining area, and kitchen seamlessly. Large windows allow for natural light and unobstructed views of the surrounding cityscape.   - **Premium Materials:** You will find materials like **marble, polished wood,** and **granite** in the finishes, particularly in areas such as the kitchen, bathrooms, and flooring. The use of **high-end appliances** (e. g. , built-in ovens, dishwashers, refrigerators, etc. ) is standard.   - **Bedrooms:** The three bedrooms are typically **spacious and well-designed**, each with its own closet space and possibly an en-suite bathroom. **King-sized or queen-sized beds**, premium linens, and elegant storage solutions (like built-in wardrobes) are common. The master bedroom might feature a **walk-in closet** and direct views of the Burj Khalifa.   - **Bathrooms:** The bathrooms are luxurious, often featuring **rainfall showers**, **bathtubs**, and **high-end fixtures**. Expect **marble counters**, **dual sinks** in the master bathroom, and designer toiletries. ### 3. **Amenities and Features**  - **Smart Home Technology:** Given the luxury nature of such properties, the apartment may include **smart home systems** to control lighting, climate, security, and entertainment features with ease, such as via your smartphone or voice commands.   - **Fully Equipped Kitchen:** The kitchen will come with top-of-the-line appliances, including a **double-door refrigerator**, **oven**, **microwave**, **dishwasher**, and possibly even a **wine cooler**. **Custom cabinetry** and **granite countertops** provide both style and functionality.   - **Laundry Room:** Many high-end apartments include a **dedicated laundry area** with a **washing machine** and **dryer**, either inside the apartment or within the building complex.   - **Building Amenities:** In addition to the apartment itself, you will have access to luxury amenities such as a **swimming pool**, **gym**, **concierge services**, **valet parking**, and **24/7 security**. Some buildings also have additional services like **housekeeping**, **room service**, and **private lounges**. ### 4. **Luxury and Comfort**  - **Comfort and Privacy:** The combination of a spacious layout, luxurious finishes, and attention to detail offers an exceptional level of comfort and privacy. The living space is designed not only to be beautiful but also highly functional for everyday life.   - **Exclusive Living Experience:** Living in such a property offers an exclusive lifestyle, with access to **high-end retail**, fine dining, and entertainment options just a short walk away. The location itself is one of the most sought-after in the city, offering a blend of privacy and proximity to the best that Dubai has to offer. ### Conclusion:A **fully furnished three-bedroom apartment** with views of the **Burj Khalifa** combines **luxury, convenience, and breathtaking vistas**. It offers an exceptional standard of living, with attention to both aesthetic and practical details. Living here means having access to one of the most iconic views in the world while enjoying a lifestyle of comfort, elegance, and convenience in the heart of Dubai.

It is one of the most sought-after residential areas in the emirate. While this sub-community is largely residential, some commercial and financial facilities like banks and hotels are also there. Undoubtedly yet, Al Mankhool is one of the most popular areas for renting apartments in Bur Dubai. The location alone is a strategic asset of Al Mankhool. Kuwait Street intersects the area making the commute for residents hassle-free. Besides its location, the area covers all interests including fashion, dining and schooling. description: Engel & Voelkers is pleased to offer this 1-bedroom apartment, Mid floor with Sea View available furnished for Rent         Property Details:- 1 Bedroom- 2 Bathrooms- Spacious Kitchen- Equipped kitchen- Wide Balcony- Unfurnished- Mid FloorD1 Tower is one of the main residential skyscrapers in Culture Village with a height of 284 metres (932 ft). This 78-floor building has 526 units which include studio apartments, one-bedroom apartments, two-bedroom apartments, three-bedroom apartments, four-bedroom apartments, five-bedroom apartments, and six-bedroom penthouses housed on high floors of the building. D1 Tower was developed by Enshaa who had purchased it from Emirates Sunland Group. The tower was developed in a joint project by Dubai Properties Group and Emirates Sunland Group. Holford Associates is the architectural firm that developed the framework for this building. D1 construction started in 2007 and it was ready for handover in 2015. D1 Tower at Jaddaf Waterfront is in 231st position among the tallest buildings in the world. and Regionally, it ranks at 45th place among the tallest buildings in the Middle East. D1 Tower is adjacent to the Palazzo Versace Dubai.
